enWisdom: By conferring favours, people are enthralled
One who bestows goodness [to others] is served [by them]
One who gives [generously from] his wealth makes [others] subservient [to him]
One who gives generously enthrals the people

Wisdom: مَنْ سَمَحَتْ نَفْسُهُ بِالْعَطَاءِ اسْتَعْبَدَ أَبْنَاءَ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: One who is generous in granting [favours], enthrals the people of this world
